channel.title: Okta expression language :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Okta expression language Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: WIC App Developer, Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: “Legacy” Expression Language : https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/okta-expression-language/ (intro, popular expressions, unsupported features) Expression Language in IDX : https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/okta-expression-language-in-identity-engine/ Page type: Reference Content type: Lookup lists and tables
